questions.question: There are some other things on my mind too, including
Is there anything else you'd like to share with your surgical team before your visit?

solutions.title: HIGH NEED
solutions.description: We’d love to help you in more ways than one and have a few options to help support and prepare you for surgery including a new hospital sponsored transportation option for day of surgery and an in-person walk-through of the surgery process. We’ll follow up directly with more information.
